content.right: # Edit Multiple JIRA Issues, Faster The power of Jira with the familiarity of spreadsheets. Visor brings your team together to plan, track, and collaborate on your Jira data — all in one place.

content: # Trusted by teams at the world’s leading organizations

# Ready to Get Started? 
 Put an end to one-off spreadsheets and copy-paste drama. 

 Visor keeps your spreadsheet data in sync with Jira so you can focus on work, not data entry.

content.right:
# Spreadsheet Simplicity to Manage Your Backlog 
 Visor’s Table View offers the simplicity of a spreadsheet and robust Jira functionality. Pull your Jira data into a Visor Workbook and edit issues inline. Sort issues, update their priority in bulk, push everything back into Jira and finally clean up that backlog of yours. 

 <button>Try free</button>

content.left:
# Gantt View to Visualize and Share 
 Make it easier to communicate the plan in your head by creating a Gantt chart! Eliminate confusion by clearly highlighting when work should be completed, and aligning your team around upcoming deadlines. 

 <button>Try gantt view</button>

content.right:
# Product Roadmaps for You + Team 
 Group issues into a timeline view by their assignee to help team members see how their work fits in. Or, group by OKR to help executives understand how your team works towards company goals. Share your Visor roadmap to achieve buy-in. 

 <button>Try readmaps free</button>

content.left:
# All of this available with just three simple steps 
 1) Connect Visor to your Jira. 

 2) Import the Jira issues you care about. 

 3) Organize, plan, edit, and share you work. 

 <button>Get started now</button>
